data.text: Tɔɠɔɠulagi vizɔgɛ naavolo wolaiti ba,
Kpɛtɛ nui ta bala nui ti ɓɔgɛ faa ɠila ma:
Ɠima nui ɠa ɗa maanɔɠɔi ɠa é ʋaazu, é lɛkpɛ tuɠɔ,
Ɓɔɠɔmaayeii ta Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠaazuluabai ma ɠulanumai ɠa ga,
Yaava ʋelei, ɠaingiti ka ti su, ta baliiti, maanɛai nu maaɠooza ba,

Doungoi ɠala ga pelei maanɛai é ziɛ la,22:6 Doungoi ɠala ga pelei maanɛai é ziɛ la: Tati pelei taɠiligaa ɓalaa ka ga niiti: doungoi maaɠolo ga siɛ ʋelei ɓaa doungoi maaɠolo ná-eteai lɔɔzei ziɛgi zu
Kpɛtɛ nui ɠa ɗa zei, bala nui unda.
Zɔi a telebotalai vaza, toɠa teʋe ga maanɔɠɔi,
Nui é nuɓɔɠɔlai ɠɛɛzu seiɲɔɠɔiti bɛ, toɠa tuyai zɔlɔɔ,
Ɲɛɛɠulasu nui ɓɛ, kpɔɛi ɠa ɓe,
Ni nu wɔinʋɛ é ɠɛ ga masagi nɛɛɲɔɠɔi,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa wɛlɛzu faaɠwɛgi ma,
Ɲaka nui ɠa ɗa ɠɛ ma: «Zalai ɠa loni eteaʋɛ,
Wɛɛnziɛ anzanuiti daaʋɛ ɠa ga zeɠezaɠai suɠoozaai,
Ɠimalalai ɠiliʋɛ doungoi yii ʋa,
Zɔi é bala nui laazuɠɔlizu, é ʋa tɔnɔ sɔlɔɔ ba,
Dama, è woilo ga pagɔ ɠima nuiti gooi ma,
Mazɔlɔɔ fizɔgɛ è ti makɛ ɠisu,
Wɔ̀inʋɛ ga è ɠito Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋa,
Gè la tɛnɛ gooiti ta kidafaawu vaiti sɛʋɛni è ma,
Naati ta kala kitei ve è ya, soloogai kitogi ma.
Mina lo bala nui ná-zobotalai ma, è ʋa maavo,
Tɔɔzei Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ti maalobo,
Mina ziiɠaawanawana nu zeizei,
è ʋa li ɓɔɠɔ maaɠolozu ga siɛ ʋelei,
Mina ɠɛ naati saama, niiti ta ɠɛ ga zeelagaiti,
Mazɔlɔɔ ni ani la è ya, è ʋa sala,
Mina kwɛpelema wɔlɔzaɠagi zeɠe daazu,
Ni ɗa zunui ta ɠaana ɠigi ma ná-botii zu,
